ygData.subject: Research on bard stats
ygData.msgSnippet: Last week I sent out a request to everyone on the list to send me information on their bard character.  I requested everyone send me a list of their primary
ygData.messageBody:
Last week I sent out a request to everyone on the list to send me
information on their bard character. I requested everyone send me a list of
their primary stats so I could determine what the average stats were for
bard characters. Also need to know what your race is so I can differentiate
the average stats between the three races. So far the number of responses I
have received has been less than encouraging.

Unless a majority of you are opposed to using this forum for this type of
research, I will continue to periodically post this request until I get
enough responses to generate some valid results. If you are opposed to me
using this list for this type of research, send me a private email. Also,
if you send me your character's stats, be sure to send them via private
email as well.

Galtin
E'ci
